title: Of gentylnes and nobylyte A dyaloge betwen the marchaut the knyght and the plowman dysputyng who is a verey gentylman [et] who is a noble man and how men shuld come to auctoryte, compiled in maner of an enterlude with diuers toys [et] gestis addyd therto to make mery pastyme and disport.
author: Rastell, John, d. 1536.
notes: Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
